TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Just now, Mycroft said:

You can! NASA put your seat directly above the rocket!

I wish I could build small AND large craft, not just large.

Yes you can but they can only reach orbit.

I wish I could build a big SSTO that can get off the runway. :/

Granted. It gets off the runway because it runs off the end of it and crashes into the sea.

I wish Crystal Pepsi was back for more than 8 weeks.

Granted, it's Pepsi that has been cooled in a controlled environment so that it freezes in crystal form. Because this process is time consuming and requires a specialized freezer, it's $30 a bottle.

I wish for pan-fried grasshopper.

Granted! The grass hoppers are poisonous when cooked. Also, deadly.

I wish for the killer bunny of caerbannog not to kill me.
Granted, but then the Holy Hand Grenade of Antioch blows up in your hand.

Granted, but you didn't wish.

I wish people wouldn't forget to wish in this thread.

Gran-what was that?

I wish for a wish that fishes.

Granted, you get a dead, ugly and stinking fish.

I wish the internet wouldn't be such a weird and scary place.

Granted. Reddit no longer exists.

I wish for Physics^TM.

Granted, your rocket flips over due tue Physics^TM.

I wish to be home already.

Edited August 9, 2016 by ZentroCatson

Granted. You were evicted.

 

I wish that I could easily learn algebra.

Granted, you learn enough algebra to help you pass a ground level course, but at the expense of losing any knowledge you had about everything else. Your name, your hobbies, your memories, all gone.

I wish I lived in Middle Earth.

Granted, you live inside the volcano.

I wish for a wish.

Granted. It's in the Center of Kerbin.

 

I wish that I lose at something for once.

Granted, you lose at finding a date.

I wish rabbits can go to space

Granted. It turns out that rabbits die the second they are in 0-g. Hope you didn't already book your flight.

 

I wish that I could Not wish for wishes inside of wishes for more wishes and wishes inside of wishes for more wishes and wishes inside of wishes for more wishes and wishes inside of wishes for more wishes and wishes inside of wishes for more wishes.

Brain.exe. has stopped working...

 

I wish for a red shirt.

Granted, it used to be a white shirt before a bear attacked the person wearing it...

I wish I was a Jedi.

Granted, you are sent to a suicide run for your first mission!

I wish for a brain.

Granted but You are now zombie Bait!

I wish for Reusable spacex rockets.

Granted! They are reusable, but have a 99% chance of rapid thermal decomposition.

I wish for a seaplane.
Granted. It's 1,000 years old.

Beep boop *explode*

I wish for people to wish.

Granted, it's only a few people though.

I wish for all living mosquitoes in the universe to drop dead, right now.
Granted. Fleas now carry Zika.
